name: Stock_entry_template
response_html:
Dear {{purchase_manager}},

The following Items, received against {{grn}}, have arrived for Quality Inspection.

{% for item in items %} {% endfor %}
Sr. NO Item Code Item Qty UOM
{{ item.idx }} {{ item.item_code }} {{ item.item_name }} {{ item.qty }} {{ item.uom }}
subject: Items arrived for Quality Inspection.

name: Purchase Receipt Template
response_html:
Dear {{user_name}},
Purchase Receipt {{name}} has been submitted by {{submitted_by}} for the items received against the Purchase Order {{purchase_order}} .
The received items are as follows: {% for item in items %} {% endfor %}
SNO Item Code Item Qty UOM
{{ item.idx }} {{ item.item_code }} {{ item.item_name }} {{ item.qty }} {{ item.uom }}
subject: Purchase Receipt Submitted Successfully

name: Material Request Template
response_html:
Dear {{user_name}},
Material Request {{name}} has been raised by {{submitted_by}} for following items: {% for item in items %} {% endfor %}
SNO. Item Code Item Required By Qty Target Warehouse UOM
{{ item.idx }} {{ item.item_code }} {{ item.item_name }} {{item.schedule_date}} {{ item.qty }} {{item.warehouse}} {{ item.uom }}
subject: Material Request is Submitted Successfully
